name: Blowfish
tagline: Blow people away with your passion
body: This is the result of Team Blowfish for the National Day of Civic Hacking 2015 Team members Deok Gun Park # What question(s) or challenge(s) is this project is trying to address? * High-school graduates have hard time creating an impressive resume to compete with adult with experience. * Business owner have hard time finding new hire with passion. * Young people cannot find the jobs they will love. # General Project Description * Instagram for showing off your skill * LinkedIn for Young * Match.com for your passion # Slide Conti: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1owHdAAOA9JeCj39OUNilI7AsfF0Ui5kCM1Supfkq_7Y/edit?usp=sharing Channel on Code for Boston Slack: #blowfish # Links for the team (Research, resources, etc.) * http://www.youthhubboston.org/ * https://www.facebook.com/youthhubboston
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
